projects.name: Eshop
projects.description: Implemented robust user authentication and authorization mechanisms using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and Express.js middleware. Integrated Stripe payment gateway for seamless and secure online transactions, resulting in a 25% increase in completed transactions and a 15% decrease in checkout abandonment rate.

projects.name: Student GPA Predictor
projects.description: Developed a GPA prediction model using linear regression and Gradient Descent algorithm, achieving a 92% accuracy rate through cross-validation. Emphasizes data preprocessing and parameter optimization, reducing prediction errors by 20% compared to standard models.

projects.name: FilmFlix-Viewer
projects.description: Developed a user-friendly web app using Node.js, MySQL, and TMDB API for seamless movie exploration. Backend functionality implemented in Node.js ensures smooth data retrieval and manipulation.

experiences.description: Created an API for vulnerability scanning for web applications using FastAPI. Developed APIs for network scanning and currently working on further enhancements. Designed and implemented the frontend using ReactJS, and integrated public APIs for additional functionalities and purposes.

Collaborated with a diverse team of developers to address project requirements and implement solutions. Gained hands-on experience with version control systems and project management tools. Enhanced understanding of software development best practices through real-world project contributions.

full_output.name: Tilak Raj Dixit
